divs: sighting detailsi was standing on front lawn.... actually asked for confirmation.... within seconds 8 very bright ,much larger than star orange\red spheres appeared from southwest....they slowly moved across the entire sky and eventually just faded out to the northwest. entire time was a good 5 minutes, was able to text my wife to get out "now"... she witnessed also. there was a plane within the viewing field of the cluster but much higher. they all stayed within the same formation slowly traveling across the entire western sky then just either faded out or ascended gradually. as i said, i literally asked for confirmation about all this ufo stuff, and i got a response immediately.... i was genuinely grateful my wife is very much a sceptic and yet... she could not explain i took several photos with my iphone ....not the best camera or results but, they all appear in the pics
Summary: 8 very bright orange objects in formation
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Ypsilanti
There were no other sightings in Ypsilanti on or around September 6th 2013
